8722.post_excerpt:
Join us for a delightful afternoon as we embark on a scenic train journey through the beautiful Chester Creek Valley aboard the Red Brick Wine Train. Operated by West Chester Railroad, experience the charm of historic Glen Mills and enjoy views of stunning landscapes as we travel to and from West Chester. 

Each ticket is $65 and includes the 90-minute roundtrip train ride along with a half bottle of Red Brick wine and a snack to enjoy while aboard the train.
8722.meta_title: Red Brick Wine Train (Sep 21, 2025) - Red Brick Winery
8722.meta_description: Join us for a delightful afternoon as we embark on a scenic train journey through the beautiful Chester Creek Valley aboard the Red Brick Wine Train. Operated by West Chester Railroad, experience the charm of historic Glen Mills and enjoy views of stunning landscapes as we travel to and from West Chester. Each ticket is $65 and includes the 90-minute roundtrip train ride along with a half bottle of Red Brick wine and a snack to enjoy while aboard the train.

event_location: 128 Glen Mills Rd, Glen Mills, PA 19342

8673.post_title: Sunday Music Series with The Gracious
8673.post_excerpt: Red Brick Winery is hosting local musicians each Sunday from 2 - 4pm for our version of Sunday Funday. Come relax, enjoy some music and sip wine on our lush, creekside grounds. Tables will be setup or bring your own picnic blanket. We will have tasting flights, as well as wines by the glass and bottle available. Weather permitting, we'll move the music indoors around our cozy tasting room bar. Our Sunday hours are 12 - 7pm.

8418.post_title: Sunday Music Series with The Gracious
8418.post_excerpt: Red Brick Winery continues our Sunday Music Series this week with a special extended event featuring The Gracious + Chris Dougherty performing live from 2 - 5pm! There will be birthdays to celebrate and some special guest performers, so come relax, enjoy some music and sip wine on our lush, creekside grounds. Tables will be setup or bring your own picnic blanket. We will have tasting flights, as well as wines by the glass and bottle available. Weather permitting, we'll move the music indoors around our cozy tasting room bar. Our Sunday hours are 12 - 7pm.

8255.post_excerpt: We are partnering with our local friends from Luigi & Giovanni and Mercato Ristorante to bring you a delicious Taste of Italy dinner. Come join us May 3 at Mercato Catering Hall (just next to the restaurant) at 4799 West Chester Pike, Newtown Square, PA 19073. The $50 cost per person includes the buffet dinner and your first glass of wine. We will have plenty more Red Brick wines for you to purchase by the glass or bottle throughout the evening to complement your favorite selections from the buffet. There will be two seatings for this special event: 5:00-7:00pm and 7:30-9:30pm.

8223.post_title: Sunday Music Series with Tom Monari
8223.post_excerpt: Red Brick Winery will be hosting a variety of local musicians each Sunday from 2:00-4:00pm for our version of Sunday Funday. Come relax, enjoy some music and sip wine with us on our lush, creekside grounds. Tables will be setup or bring your own picnic blanket. We will have tasting flights, as well as wines by the glass and bottle available.

8198.post_title: The Gracious 'High Desert Sessions' EP Release Party
8198.post_excerpt:
The Gracious is the singer/songwriter and photography project of Kevin Schramm. Join us at Red Brick Winery to celebrate the release of the ‘High Desert Sessions” EP. Recorded in Joshua Tree, CA, the songs on ‘High Desert Sessions’ lean toward alt-country and draw inspiration from the likes of Wilco, Aimee Mann & Beck. 

This special event will feature a pop-up photography gallery and a live performance with special guests. Red Brick’s Napa Valley wines as well as local Greystone beer will be available for purchase throughout the evening. Arrive early to enjoy some pasta & salad before the show starts at 7pm. Visit thegracious.com for more!

7465.post_title: Red Brick Winery at Philly Wine Fest 2024
7465.post_excerpt: Get ready for an unforgettable experience with Red Brick Winery at Philly Wine Fest 2024! Taking place on Saturday, November 16th, 2024, from 12:00 PM to 10:00 PM, at 900 Packer Ave, Philadelphia, PA 19148, this highly anticipated event invites wine lovers of all kinds to an exclusive wine-tasting journey in Philadelphia. Whether you’re a seasoned wine connoisseur or new to the world of fine wines, Philly Wine Fest offers an immersive tasting experience that will stimulate all your senses.

7895.post_title: Wine Tasting Event at The Media Theatre
7895.post_excerpt: Join us for a special Napa wine tasting event by Red Brick Winery from 5-7pm before the evening's performance of Winter Wonderland at The Media Theatre. This event will feature four Red Brick wines poured and presented by the winery owner, paired with cheese and light snacks to complement the experience. Your $60 ticket includes this $25 tasting and a discounted seat for the show.

7244.post_title: Ride Aboard the Red Brick Wine Train - November 3, 2024
7244.post_excerpt: Join us for a delightful afternoon as we embark on a scenic train journey through the beautiful Chester Creek Valley aboard the Red Brick Wine Train. Experience the charm of historic Glen Mills as we travel to and from West Chester. Don’t miss this opportunity to create lasting memories amidst stunning landscapes! Each ticket includes the roundtrip train ride and a glass of RED BRICK WINE & cheese cup aboard the train. Upon your arrival back to Glen Mills, relax with a delicious BBQ Chicken sandwich on the lush, creekside grounds and cozy tasting room of Red Brick Winery.
7244.meta_title: Ride Aboard the Red Brick Wine Train – November 3, 2024 - Red Brick Winery
7244.meta_description: Join us for a delightful afternoon as we embark on a scenic train journey through the beautiful Chester Creek Valley aboard the Red Brick Wine Train. Experience the charm of historic Glen Mills as we travel to and from West Chester. Don’t miss this opportunity to create lasting memories amidst stunning landscapes! Each ticket includes the roundtrip train ride and a glass of RED BRICK WINE & cheese cup aboard the train. Upon your arrival back to Glen Mills, relax with a delicious BBQ Chicken sandwich on the lush, creekside grounds and cozy tasting room of Red Brick Winery.

event_title: Ride Aboard the Red Brick Wine Train – November 3, 2024
event_location: 128 Glen Mills Rd, Glen Mills, Pennsylvania 19342
event_health_safety: We will adhere to all current CDC guideline.
event_terms_conditions: *Each ticket includes the roundtrip train ride and a glass of RED BRICK WINE & cheese cup aboard the train. *Upon your arrival back to Glen Mills, relax with a delicious BBQ on the lush, creekside grounds and cozy tasting room of Red Brick Winery. *More Red Brick wines and non-alcoholic beverages available for purchase. *Have your photo ID ready when you check-in at RED BRICK WINERY at Glen Mills, (NOT in West Chester), where you will be greeted with a glass of wine and cup of cheese you can sip while you board the train. *Note, check-in opens at 2:45 pm at RED BRICK WINERY (128 Glen Mills Road, Glen Mills, PA) and the train will depart at 3:30 pm. The roundtrip train ride is 90 minutes.

5089.post_title: Murder Mystery On The Red Brick Express - November 09, 2024
5089.post_excerpt: ALL ABOARD the “Murder on the Red Brick Express” on November 9th, 2024! Immerse yourself in a thrilling murder mystery while indulging in Napa Valley’s finest wines from Red Brick Winery. Uncover the clues, savor every sip, and experience an unforgettable evening of excitement and elegance. Don’t miss out—reserve your spot today!

event_features: Scenic train ride on 1858 rails, complimentary wine & cheese, visit to a Haunted Mansion, live mystery game.
event_health_safety: We will adhere to all current CDC guidelines.
event_terms_conditions: Non-refundable, must be 21 or older to attend. Ride includes a visit to a haunted mansion.
event_ticket_inclusions: Train ride, complimentary wine & cheese, access to murder mystery game at Haunted Mansion.

5082.post_title: Red Brick Winery at Beast of a Feast
5082.post_excerpt: Join Red Brick Winery on October 10th, 2024, for the Annual “Beast of a Feast” at Elmwood Park Zoo! Treat yourself to award-winning Napa Valley wines, indulge in delicious local bites, and enjoy an evening of live music and captivating animal encounters. All while supporting wildlife conservation! It’s a night of wine tasting, fun, and a great cause—don’t miss out on this unforgettable experience!

5076.post_title: Afternoon Sip and Train Ride with RED BRICK WINERY
5076.post_excerpt: Join Red Brick Winery  for an unforgettable afternoon of wine tasting, live music, and a scenic train ride through the picturesque Chester Creek Valley. Sip exquisite wines, enjoy gourmet BBQ, and relax to the sounds of The Gracious in the historic charm of Glen Mills. Don’t miss out - book your spot today!

5070.post_title: Red Brick Winery at Allentown’s Wine ‘n Shine Prize Giveaway Palooza
5070.post_excerpt: Join us at Red Brick Winery on September 28th, 2024, for Allentown’s Wine ‘n Shine Pierogi Palooza OktoberFest! Enjoy award-winning Napa Valley wines—bold reds, crisp whites, and refreshing rosés—paired with gourmet pierogies. Immerse yourself in the festive atmosphere with live entertainment and local vendors. Don’t miss this unforgettable wine tasting celebration—mark your calendars!

4839.post_title: Red Brick Winery at Rocky Run YMCA’S Brew HAHA
4839.post_excerpt: Join Red Brick Winery on September 21st, 2024, for a memorable evening at Rocky Run YMCA’s Brew Ha-Ha in Media, Pennsylvania! Savor our award-winning Napa Valley wines alongside local craft beers in a vibrant atmosphere filled with fun and community spirit. Don’t miss this exciting celebration of Pennsylvania’s winemaking and brewing traditions—bring your friends for an unforgettable experience!
